Package au.csiro.pathling.fhirpath.function.resolver

Record Class BindingContext

java.lang.Object
java.lang.Record
au.csiro.pathling.fhirpath.function.resolver.BindingContext
Record Components:
method - The method being bound
contextDescription - Description of the current binding context (e.g., "input" or "argument 0")
public record BindingContext(@Nonnull Method method, @Nullable String contextDescription) extends Record
Provides context for parameter binding operations, including error reporting.

This class helps generate consistent, informative error messages that include the function name and context (input or specific argument).

    • reportError

      public <T> T reportError(@Nonnull String issue)
      Reports an error in this binding context.
      Type Parameters:
      T - the return type (never actually returned as method always throws)
      Parameters:
      issue - The issue to report
      Returns:
      Never returns, always throws an exception
      Throws:
      InvalidUserInputError - Always thrown with a formatted message

    • check

      public void check(boolean condition, @Nonnull String issue)
      Checks a condition and reports an error if it's false.
      Parameters:
      condition - The condition to check
      issue - The issue to report if the condition is false
      Throws:
      InvalidUserInputError - Thrown with a formatted message if condition is false

    • equals

      public final boolean equals(Object o)
      Indicates whether some other object is "equal to" this one. The objects are equal if the other object is of the same class and if all the record components are equal. All components in this record class are compared with Objects::equals(Object,Object).
      Specified by:
      equals in class Record
      Parameters:
